feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.9
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed error rendering when using a duplicate offer code (#20156) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed Admin search sometimes stalling on first query (#20143) - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.8...v5.82.9

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.10
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.11

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.12
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed External Image URLs being incorrectly prefixed (#20226) - Ronald Langeveld
  • 🐛 Fixed redundant member data loading for static assets (#20031) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.11...v5.82.12

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.83.0
entry.content:
